attributes.action: Not Allow the networks to Lock the phone to  there network ONLY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the networks should not be allowed to LOCK the phone to there network. I Think all phones should be  Unlocked to all networks or give Free unlocking on request . why should we pay up to £200 for  a phone and when we want it unlock we have to pay a fee.
